body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install rocblas@4.1.0 tensile_architecture=gfx906
```

### Error Message

```
  >> 143    TensileCreateLibrary: error: argument --architecture: invalid choic
            e: 'gfx906' (choose from 'all', 'gfx000', 'gfx803', 'gfx900', 'gfx9
            06:xnack-', 'gfx908:xnack-')
  >> 144    CMake Error at /dev/shm/spack/hstoppel/spack-stage-rocblas-4.1.0-vj
            jbrm56jvkreeibjcnrq5yfoqibnfil/spack-build-vjjbrm5/virtualenv/cmake
            /TensileConfig.cmake:216 (message):
```
title: rocblas arch list incorrect for 4.1.0
